doc:
Jack Arnold (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Arnold_(director) 0 Jack Arnold (October 14, 1916 – March 17, 1992) was an American actor and film and television director, best known as one of the leading filmmakers of 1950s science fiction films. His most notable films are It Came from Outer Space (1953), Creature from the Black Lagoon (1954), Tarantula (1955), and The Incredible Shrinking Man (1957). Jack_Arnold ( October_14_,_1916 – March_17_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor and film_and_television_director , best_known as one of the_leading_filmmakers of 1950s_science_fiction_films . His_most_notable_films are It Came from Outer_Space_(_1953_) , Creature from the_Black_Lagoon_(_1954_) , Tarantula_(_1955_) , and The_Incredible_Shrinking_Man_(_1957_) .
